        Parameters:
        filename - The filename
        delimiter - The column delimiter
        stateIdx - The column indices for the state
        actionIdx - The column indices for the action
        nextStateIdx - The column indices for the next state
        rewardIdx - the column index for the reward
        skipFirstLine - indicator if the first line should be skipped
